body.text:
Hello Komal,

Thanks very much for your offer. We will revert to you soon.

Best regards,
[cid:image001.png@01DC0C52.D9506B10]

Dear Mr. Arjun,

Greetings of the day !

Please find below offer and herewith attached docs for your reference.

Product            : MHPT
Price                 : USD 8000/MT FOB Indian port
: USD 8140/MT CIF New York 20ft

Packing            : 1000kg IBC Tank & 200kg MS Barrel
Delivery           : 3-4 Weeks after receiving the order
Origin              : India
Offer Validity   : Subject to reconfirmation while placing the order.
Rest of term remain same.

Looking forward to your confirmation on above shared price.

Hello Komal,
Good day.
We are having requirement for below mentioned products, please let us have your best offer to move forward,
Product Name : N-methyl-N-hydroxyethyl-p-toluidine (MHPT) CAS# 2842-44-6
Quantity: 1x20 FT FCL
Packing: Drums and IBC
Destination: CIF Newyork
Pricing: Need FOB and Freight separately
Attach 3 COA, TDS and SDS
Kindly share lead time of the shipment along with country of origin.
Hopefully, we can have your offer at the earliest.
Best regards,
[cid:image004.png@01DC0C52.D9506B10]
